gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve a list of custom field configurations for my project so that I can ensure all necessary fields are set up correctly.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of custom field configurations, including field IDs, names, and their respective contexts.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to get the configuration details of a specific custom field by its ID or key to understand how it is set up in the project.
gold.ideal: The API should return the configuration details of the specified custom field, including its context, options, and any associated metadata.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I want to update the configuration of a custom field to reflect new requirements for data collection in our projects.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully update the custom field configuration and return a confirmation message along with the updated configuration details.
